name: 張彥元
objective:
本課程旨在培養閱讀技巧與策略、建立分析與批判之閱讀能力，以及報告寫作之能力，並透過課堂主題簡報，培養學生理解以及表達不同主題之能力。
This course aims to help students develop a variety of reading skills and strategies, build students’ ability to read analytically and critically, develop students’ ability in writing a short report, and through in-class subject presentations, foster students’ ability to deliver and understand a variety of topics in English.
